description: Provides a barrier between you and pesky insects, and cuts down the need for repellent.Polyester with UV protection.Loose fit, mesh sides for breathability.Zippered mesh hood works with or without a hat.Adjustable wrists; drawstring with cordlock waist.Small fits 18 months to 5 years. Large fits 5 to 9 yearsSize small has cuffs at the wrist and size large has an adjustable toggle.
name: Original Bug Shirt Company Polyester Insect-Proof Shirt - Infants to Youths
